entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
